query:
SELECT 
  prefecture, 
  city, 
  propertyType,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  AVG(priceYen) as avg_price,
  MIN(priceYen) as min_price,
  MAX(priceYen) as max_price,
  AVG(unitPriceYenPerM2) as avg_unit_price
FROM transactions 
WHERE prefecture = '東京都' AND city LIKE '%小平%'
GROUP BY prefecture, city, propertyType
LIMIT 20;
